results.title: New life new country
results.creator_credit: Fatma Coskun, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Fatma Coskun came from a small village amongst the mountains of Corun. However, financial hardships drove her and her husband to Australia to start a new life. Despite a major setback at the beginning of their journey, Fatma and her family consider themselves very fortunate to have settled in Australia.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Fatma Coskun, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.description: Fatma Coskun came from a small village amongst the mountains of Corun. However, financial hardships drove her and her husband to Australia to start a new life. results.title: My second home
results.creator_credit: Memet Gunes, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Memet Gunes was one of the lucky few people in his village in Turkey to receive an education. When he migrated to Australia with his family he found a place full of possibility and opportunity.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Memet Gunes, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI

results.title: Ithal Damat = Imported groom
results.creator_credit: Huseyin Duman, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Huseyin Damat left Turkey for Australia to meet and marry his wife. Although he was sad to leave his family behind, his journey here was an eventful one, especially when he discovered he was on the same flight as Swedish super group ABBA.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Huseyin Duman, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.description: Huseyin Damat left Turkey for Australia to meet and marry his wife. Although he was sad to leave his family behind, his journey here was an eventful one, especially when he discovered he was on the same flight as Swedish super group ABBA.

results.title: From a small island to a giant continent : the story of a Cypriot Turk
results.creator_credit: Ifran Hassan, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Ifran Hassan recalls leaving his homeland of Cyprus in 1970 to escape the troubled political climate, his destination, Melbourne where he set out to make a new life for himself and to help improve the lives of others.
results.title_for_label: From a small island to a giant continent : the story of a Cypriot Turk

results.title: Avustralyadan bir enstantane...
results.creator_credit: Bayram Ocal, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Bayram Ocal reflects on his many achievements since migrating to Australia in the late sixties, including contributing to the foundation of a Turkish Islamic society, an Islamic funeral service, a mosque and various Turkish language newspapers.

results.title: Australyaya Gelisiminhikayesi = Coming to Australia
results.creator_credit: Riza Guclu, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: When Riza Guclu moved to Australia with his family, he was looking for a better life, like most immigrants. With that in mind, he learnt what he need to help him succeed.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Riza Guclu, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI

results.title: Digital Storytelling workshop : general public (September 2007)
results.creator_credit: Terry Melvin, Robyn Colls, Maria McCarthy, Laura Brearley, David Clune, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Life changing events, the experience of Italian immigrants, tributes to loved ones. These four digital stories, created by members of the public and facilitated by ACMI staff, are a biographical record of things closest to the hearts of the participants.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Terry Melvin, Robyn Colls, Maria McCarthy, Laura Brearley, David Clune, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
